H0.text: Hagar was the mother of which of Abraham's sons. Isaac

H1.text: Hagar was the mother of which of Abraham's sons. Esau

H2.text: Hagar was the mother of which of Abraham's sons. Jacob

H3.text: Hagar was the mother of which of Abraham's sons. Ä°smail

A4.text: Abraham's firstborn son through Hagar, Ishmael, became the progenitor of the Ishmaelites, generally taken to be the Arabs.

A5.text: God heard her son crying and came to rescue them. The angel opened Hagar's eyes and she saw a well of water. He also told Hagar that God would 'make a great nation' of Ishmael.
